title: Video Game
description: Developed a responsive web app for video game browsing, optimizing performance and user experience.

title: Expenses List
description: Implemented a form for adding new expenses with validation, ensuring data integrity with the Zod library.

title: Counter-app

title: Vidly app

title: Sky Hosting website
description: Employed modular CSS principles to create reusable components and build a complex layout. Converted a Photoshop design into a fast, responsive, and visually appealing website for a cloud hosting company.
